English: I don't have to listen to this.
I don't want to throw that away.
What did you promise to do?
I just kept my mouth shut.

French: Je me suis occupé de tout.

English: I don't want to sign that.

French: Il nous déconseilla de le faire.
Je n'ai pas le droit de sortir.

English: I am {{1::doubtful}} whether he will come.
I am doubtful whether he will come.
I doubt if he will come.

French: Je ne peux pas me l'imaginer.
Le père de tom est cool.
